snippet.title: LISA - Definitive Edition | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We’re overJOYed to announce…

✨ LISA: Definitive Edition ✨

LISA: Definitive Edition, along with Definitive Editions for LISA: The Painful and LISA: The Joyful, will offer exciting features:

- HD graphics & updated UI
- Next gen functionalities including Nintendo Switch HD Rumble, PlayStation DualSense haptics, light bar, & adaptive triggers, DualShock 4/DualSense speaker audio
- 120 FPS mode for PC and next gen consoles
- New enemies and bosses to challenge
- New stories, multiple story endings
- 20+ new songs
- Music Player
- Localized to 12+ languages
- Painless (story) mode
- New border art overlays
- Pixel perfect int scaling option
- Secrets
- and more!

LISA: Definitive Edition:
Website: https://serenityforge.com/games/lisa-definitive-edition
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/335670/LISA_The_Painful/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/lisa-the-painful-definitive-edition-switch/
Xbox: https://xbox.com/en-US/games/store/lisa-definitive-edition/9PKCKMMC8M9S
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004276
Epic Games Store: Coming Soon

In LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition, you play as Brad Armstrong, a middle aged, ex-martial arts instructor haunted by memories of a broken childhood and the death of his sister, Lisa. Following a mysterious event where all women appear to have been wiped out, Brad happens upon an abandoned baby girl who he decides to adopt and protect. When she goes missing one fateful night, Brad will find himself journeying through the lawless, post-apocalyptic wasteland of Olathe to rescue her before it’s too late.

In LISA: The Joyful - Definitive Edition, the epic series finale, you play as a girl born to the post-apocalyptic world of Olathe following a mysterious event known only as the White Flash. An event that left Olathe with only men, and seemingly no women to be found… except her, that is. Wear masks to keep the truth of your identity a secret, indulge in quests to punish all those who’ve wronged you, learn more about Olathe’s strange origins, and get to know yourself better as you make a host of difficult, game-altering choices.

LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition:
Website: https://serenityforge.com/games/lisa-the-painful-definitive-edition
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/335670/LISA_The_Painful/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/lisa-the-painful-definitive-edition-switch/
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/lisa-the-painful-definitive-edition/9P3488V8GCW7/0017
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004276
Epic Games Store: Coming Soon

LISA: The Joyful - Definitive Edition:
Website: https://serenityforge.com/games/lisa-the-joyful-definitive-edition
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/379310/LISA_the_Joyful/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/lisa-the-joyful-definitive-edition-switch/
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/lisa-the-joyful-definitive-edition/9N01FNJF31CD/0017
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004276
Epic Games Store: Coming Soon

Dingaling Productions: 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DingalingGames
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeH7vV-oRaH72jARgCGTkqA

Serenity Forge:
